meanings.definition: A Hindu god, the destroyer of evil and the transformer
meanings.sent1: During the festival, people pray to Shiva for blessings.
meanings.sent2: In Hindu mythology, Shiva is one of the principal deities.
meanings.sent3: The children enacted a play where Shiva defeated the evil demon.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to overcome challenges was like the power of Shiva.
meanings.sent5: The statue of Shiva in the temple was adorned with colorful flowers.

meanings.definition: A period of seven days of mourning in Judaism
meanings.sent1: The family observed the shiva after the passing of their loved one.
meanings.sent2: During the shiva, friends and family gathered to offer support.
meanings.sent3: Despite the somber occasion, the shiva brought the family closer together.
meanings.sent4: The shiva period allowed time for reflection and remembrance.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to comfort the family during the shiva.

meanings.definition: A form of meditation in yoga practice
meanings.sent1: She found inner peace through the practice of shiva meditation.
meanings.sent2: The shiva technique helped her relax and focus her mind.
meanings.sent3: During shiva meditation, she visualized a calm, serene lake.
meanings.sent4: The shiva meditation session left her feeling rejuvenated and centered.
meanings.sent5: The instructor guided the class through a series of shiva poses for relaxation.
